channel.title: US Federal Government Request For Comments
channel.description: This pulls from a search of the Federal Register to pull requests for comments and make them readable.

item.title: Notice of Public Meetings and Request for Comment on the Modernization of Pilot Schools
item.description:
The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) is seeking comments regarding the modernization of pilot school regulations. FAA aims to have discussions with flight training industry to create a robust, safe training environment, and address challenges related to evolving technology, certification, examining authority and learning methods. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 MAY 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-04/html/2025-05795.htm
item.category: Federal Aviation Administration, U.S. Department of Transportation.

item.title: Request for Comment To Withhold Certain Aircraft Registration Information From Public Dissemination
item.description:
The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) is seeking comments on the impact of removing certain aircraft registration data, including private owner's Personally Identifiable Information (PII), from public display on the FAA website as per requirement Section 803 of the FAA Reauthorization Act of 2024. COMMENTS_DUE: 05 MAY 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-03/html/2025-05738.htm
item.category: Federal Aviation Administration (FAA), Department of Transportation (DOT).
